TermDefinition.DefinitionText: The use of illegal drugs or the use of prescription or over-the-counter drugs for purposes other than those for which they are meant to be used, or in large amounts. Drug abuse may lead to social, physical, emotional, and job-related problems.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "abuso de drogas"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Uso de sustancias ilegales o uso de medicamentos bajo receta médica o sin esta, con fines diferentes de los que se entiende que deben usarse, o para su consumo en grandes cantidades. El abuso de drogas puede conducir a problemas sociales, físicos, emocionales y laborales.
